class yonata.core.Yonata(postgres_connection=<factory>, minio_connection=<factory>)[source]

Bases: object

do_benchmark_from_image_folder(instance, folder_path, extensions=['.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png', '.bmp', '.tiff', '.tif', '.webp', '.ppm', '.pgm', '.pbm', '.hdr', '.pic', '.jp2'])[source]

Benchmark the given instance on all images inside a folder.

Parameters:

  • instance (object) – instance of the class of application to benchmark.

  • folder_path (str) – path to the folder containing images to benchmark.

  • extensions (list[str], optional) – list of image file extensions to benchmark. Defaults to all allowed extensions. Refer to yonata.constant.IMAGE_EXTENSIONS.

Return type:

None

Notes

If the folder has subfolders, and those subfolders have files that match the extension, then those files are also extracted.

minio_connection: MinioConnection
